title: Studio apartment in N. Berkeley, walkable to campus, Downtown and BART
map_address: Francisco St. near Martin Luther King Jr. Ave.
posting_body: ['1920 Francisco St is on a quiet, tree-lined street in an incredibly accessible neighborhood just north of downtown Berkeley.', 'Walkable to UC Berkeley Campus, BART, downtown shops and restaurants, and world-famous North Berkeley eateries, this location is especially great for graduate and independent students and those seeking to experience the best that Berkeley has to offer.', 'Amenities include laundry in the building, roof deck, private balconies, intercom delivery system, fiber-optic internet hookups (service not included), and available garage parking.', 'We also have units on the South side of the UC Berkeley campus.', 'Visit our website for more info on those: <URL>/', 'For all units: security deposit is 1.5x the monthly rent; utilities not included; units are unfurnished; no smoking and no pets.', 'Looking for 1 year lease, but are flexible.', ' All prices are negotiable.', '$1850/mo', 'Email or call with some details about yourself for more information.', 'Have a wonderful day!']
